source.sqlReaderQuery:
select * from master.table_name where name not like '%cmh%' 
and name not like '%ims%' 
and name not like '%cpa%'

SELECT 
ActionFlag
,SysCreatedDate
,SysModifiedDate
,Pipeline
,StoredProcedure
,IMSGeographyID
,GeographyID
,IMSChannelID
,IMSPackageID
,IMSMarketID
,MonthID
,IMSUnit
,IMSCountingUnit
,IMSStandardUnit
,IMSValue
,IMSValueUsd
,IMSVolume
,DataSource
FROM dw.fact_ims_max_by_market
WHERE DataSource='IMS'

SELECT 
ActionFlag
,SysCreatedDate
,SysModifiedDate
,Pipeline
,StoredProcedure
,IMSGeographyID
,GeographyID
,IMSChannelID
,IMSPackageID
,MonthID
,IMSUnit
,IMSCountingUnit
,IMSStandardUnit
,IMSValue
,IMSValueUsd
,DataSource
FROM dw.fact_ims_max_by_product
where DataSource='IMS'

SELECT 
ActionFlag
,SysCreatedDate
,SysModifiedDate
,Pipeline
,StoredProcedure
,IMSGeographyID
,GeographyID
,IMSChannelID
,IMSPackageID
,IMSMarketID
,MonthID
,IMSUnit
,IMSCountingUnit
,IMSStandardUnit
,IMSValue
,IMSValueUsd
,IMSVolume
,DataSource
FROM dw.fact_ims_max_by_market
WHERE DataSource='MAX'

SELECT 
ActionFlag
,SysCreatedDate
,SysModifiedDate
,Pipeline
,StoredProcedure
,IMSGeographyID
,GeographyID
,IMSChannelID
,IMSPackageID
,MonthID
,IMSUnit
,IMSCountingUnit
,IMSStandardUnit
,IMSValue
,IMSValueUsd
,DataSource
FROM dw.fact_ims_max_by_product
where DataSource='MAX'

SELECT COUNT(1)  as cnt FROM  stg.stg_check_cmh_geography
where ISNeedAdd='Y';

SELECT 
cmh_province_name	
,cmh_city_name	
,province_code	
,province_name	
,city_code	
,city_name
FROM 
(
SELECT 
CMHProvinceName cmh_province_name
,CMHCityName    cmh_city_name
,ProvinceCode   province_code
,ProvinceName   province_name
,CityCode       city_code
,CityName       city_name
FROM  stg.stg_check_cmh_geography
WHERE ISNeedAdd='Y'
UNION ALL

SELECT 
DISTINCT
CMHProvinceName cmh_province_name
,CMHCityName    cmh_city_name
,ProvinceCode   province_code
,ProvinceName   province_name
,CityCode       city_code
,CityName       city_name
FROM  stg.stg_cmh_geography_mapping
)  GM

SELECT COUNT(1)  as cnt FROM  itg.itg_cmh_map_market 
WHERE CMHCoreMarket='Y' AND StandardBrandName IS NULL;

select 
DISTINCT 
 AA.market
,AA.mole_name
,AA.corp_name
,AA.product_name
,AA.Drug_Type
,AA.rx_type
,AA.form
,AA.type_1
,AA.type_2
,AA.strength
,AA.standard_corp_name
,AA.standard_brand_name
,AA.core_market
,AA.standardized_rate_by_DOT
,AA.brand_name
FROM (
select  
 [CMHMarketName]        market
,[CMHMoleculeName]      mole_name
,CMHCorprationName      corp_name
,CMHProductName         product_name
,[CMHDrugType]          Drug_Type
,[CMHPrescriptionType]  rx_type
,[CMHForm]              form
,[CMHType1]             type_1
,[CMHType2]             type_2
,[CMHStrength]          strength
,StandardCorprationName standard_corp_name
,StandardBrandName      standard_brand_name
,[CMHCoreMarket]        core_market
,[CMHStandardizedRateByDot]  standardized_rate_by_DOT
,CMHProbrandName brand_name
from itg.itg_cmh_map_market 
WHERE CMHCoreMarket='Y'
UNION ALL
select  
 [CMHMarketName]        market
,[CMHMoleculeName]      mole_name
,CMHCorprationName      corp_name
,CMHProductName         product_name
,[CMHDrugType]          Drug_Type
,[CMHPrescriptionType]  rx_type
,[CMHForm]              form
,[CMHType1]             type_1
,[CMHType2]             type_2
,[CMHStrength]          strength
,StandardCorprationName standard_corp_name
,StandardBrandName      standard_brand_name
,[CMHCoreMarket]        core_market
,[CMHStandardizedRateByDot]  standardized_rate_by_DOT
,CMHProbrandName brand_name
from stg.stg_cmh_map_market 
) AA
order by  standard_brand_name desc
,market
,mole_name
,corp_name
,product_name
,Drug_Type
,form
,strength

select 
COUNT(1)  as cnt 
from stg.stg_check_cmh_market 
WHERE ISNeedAdd='Y'

select 
distinct 
 [CMHMarketName] market
,[CMHMoleculeName]  mole_name
,[CMHPrescriptionType]  Drug_Type
,[CMHDrugType]          rx_type
,[CMHForm]              form
,[CMHType1]             type_1
,[CMHType2]             type_2
,[CMHStrength]          strength
,[CMHCoreMarket]        core_market
,NULL  standardized_rate_by_DOT
from stg.stg_check_cmh_market 
WHERE ISNeedAdd='Y'     
ORDER BY 
[CMHMarketName]
,[CMHMoleculeName]
,[CMHPrescriptionType]
,[CMHDrugType]
,[CMHForm] 
,[CMHType1]
,[CMHType2] 
,[CMHStrength]
select count(1) as counts  from stg.data_check where CheckCode in ('4','5') and CheckFlag='1';

SELECT COUNT(1)  as cnt FROM  stg.stg_check_cpa_geography
where ISNeedAdd='Y';

SELECT 
cpa_province_name	
,cpa_city_name	
,province_code	
,province_name	
,city_code	
,city_name
FROM (
SELECT 
CPAProvinceName cpa_province_name
,CPACityName    cpa_city_name
,ProvinceCode   province_code
,ProvinceName   province_name
,CityCode       city_code
,CityName       city_name
FROM  stg.stg_check_cpa_geography
WHERE  ISNeedAdd='Y'
UNION ALL
SELECT 
DISTINCT 
CPAProvinceName cpa_province_name
,CPACityName    cpa_city_name
,ProvinceCode   province_code
,ProvinceName   province_name
,CityCode       city_code
,CityName       city_name
FROM  stg.stg_cpa_geography_mapping
) GM

SELECT COUNT(1)  as cnt FROM  itg.itg_cpa_map_market 
WHERE  StandardBrandName IS NULL

SELECT 
DISTINCT 
market
,mole_name
,corp_name
,product_name
,dosage
,dosage_en
,customattribute3
,customattribute3_en
,pack_des
,standard_corp_name
,standard_brand_name
,standardized_rate_by_DOT
,core_market
FROM (
SELECT 
CPAMarketName             market
,CPAMoleculeName          mole_name
,CPACorprationName        corp_name
,CPAProductName           product_name
,CPAForm                  dosage
,CPAFormEn                dosage_en
,CPAAdministrationRoute   customattribute3
,CPAAdministrationRouteEn customattribute3_en
,CPAStrength              pack_des
,StandardCorprationName   standard_corp_name
,StandardBrandName        standard_brand_name
,CPAStandardizedRateByDot standardized_rate_by_DOT
,CPACoreMarket            core_market
FROM itg.itg_cpa_map_market 
UNION ALL
SELECT 
CPAMarketName             market
,CPAMoleculeName          mole_name
,CPACorprationName        corp_name
,CPAProductName           product_name
,CPAForm                  dosage
,CPAFormEn                dosage_en
,CPAAdministrationRoute   customattribute3
,CPAAdministrationRouteEn customattribute3_en
,CPAStrength              pack_des
,StandardCorprationName   standard_corp_name
,StandardBrandName        standard_brand_name
,CPAStandardizedRateByDot standardized_rate_by_DOT
,CPACoreMarket            core_market
FROM stg.stg_cpa_map_market 
) AA
order by standard_brand_name desc
,market
,mole_name
,corp_name
,product_name
,dosage
,customattribute3
,pack_des

select 
COUNT(1) as cnt 
from stg.stg_check_cpa_market cm
WHERE IsNeedFill='Y'

select  distinct
 cm.CPAMarketName
,cm.CPAMoleculeName
,isnull(mk.CPAForm,cm.CPAForm) CPAForm
,mk.CPAFormEn
,isnull(mkr.CPAAdministrationRoute,cm.CPAAdministrationRoute) CPAAdministrationRoute
,mkr.CPAAdministrationRouteEn
,cm.CPAStrength

,cm.CPAStandardizedRateByDot
,cm.CPACoreMarket
from stg.stg_check_cpa_market cm

left join (select distinct CPAForm,CPAFormEn  
           from [itg].[itg_cpa_map_market] 
		    where CPAFormEn is not null
		  ) mk
   on (cm.CPAForm=mk.CPAForm or cm.CPAForm=mk.CPAFormEn)
left join (select distinct CPAAdministrationRoute,CPAAdministrationRouteEn  
           from [itg].[itg_cpa_map_market] 
		    where CPAAdministrationRouteEn is not null
		  ) mkr
  on (cm.CPAAdministrationRoute=mkr.CPAAdministrationRoute 
      or cm.CPAAdministrationRoute=mkr.CPAAdministrationRouteEn)
WHERE IsNeedFill='Y'
select COUNT(1) as cnt from stg.data_check where CheckCode in ('6','7') and CheckFlag='1'

select distinct
 cm.CPAMarketName
,cm.CPAMoleculeName
,isnull(mk.CPAForm,cm.CPAForm) CPAForm
,mk.CPAFormEn
,isnull(mkr.CPAAdministrationRoute,cm.CPAAdministrationRoute) CPAAdministrationRoute
,mkr.CPAAdministrationRouteEn
,cm.CPAStrength

,cm.CPAStandardizedRateByDot
,cm.CPACoreMarket
from stg.stg_check_cpa_market cm

left join (select distinct CPAForm,CPAFormEn  
           from [itg].[itg_cpa_map_market] 
		    where CPAFormEn is not null
		  ) mk
   on (cm.CPAForm=mk.CPAForm or cm.CPAForm=mk.CPAFormEn)
left join (select distinct CPAAdministrationRoute,CPAAdministrationRouteEn  
           from [itg].[itg_cpa_map_market] 
		    where CPAAdministrationRouteEn is not null
		  ) mkr
  on (cm.CPAAdministrationRoute=mkr.CPAAdministrationRoute 
      or cm.CPAAdministrationRoute=mkr.CPAAdministrationRouteEn)
WHERE IsNeedFill='Y'

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM stg.stg_master_inmarket_summary_check_result WHERE CheckedOn = (SELECT MAX(CheckedOn) FROM stg.stg_master_inmarket_summary_check_result WHERE ModuleName = ''',pipeline().parameters.pModuleName,''') AND ModuleName = ''',pipeline().parameters.pModuleName,''' AND ISNULL(TargetRowCount,0) <> ISNULL(SourceRowCount,0)')

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT COUNT(1)  as cnt FROM  stg.check_ims_geography_mapping

SELECT 
ims_city_code
,ims_city_name
,ims_city_en
,province_code
,province_name
,city_code
,city_name
,SG
FROM(
SELECT 
distinct 
ims_city_code
,ims_city_name
,ims_city_en
,province_code
,province_name
,city_code
,city_name
,SG
FROM stg.check_ims_geography_mapping
UNION ALL
SELECT 
distinct 
IMSCityCode   ims_city_code
,IMSCityName  ims_city_name
,IMSCityEN	  ims_city_en
,ProvinceCode province_code
,ProvinceName province_name
,CityCode	  city_code
,CityName	  city_name
,SG			  SG
FROM stg.stg_ims_geography_mapping
) GM

order by province_code,ims_city_name

SELECT COUNT(1)  as cnt FROM  itg.itg_ims_map_market 
WHERE  IMSStandardBrandName IS NULL

SELECT 
DISTINCT 
IMSMarketName                  Market
,IMSMoleculeCompositionName	   moleculecomposition
,IMSProductName				   product
,IMSCorporationName			   corpration
,IMSManufacturerName		   manufacturer
,IMSTherapeuticClass4Name	   TereputiceClassIV
,IMSStrengthName			   strength
,IMSNewformcodeiName		   newformcodei
,IMSNewformcodeiiName		   newformcodeii
,IMSStandardCorporationName	   standard_corp_name
,IMSStandardManufacturerName   standard_manufacturer_name
,IMSStandardBrandName		   standard_brand_name
,IMSStandardizedRateByDot	   standardized_rate_by_DOT
,IMSCoreMarket				   core_market
FROM(
SELECT 
IMSMarketName                  
,IMSMoleculeCompositionName	   
,IMSProductName				   
,IMSCorporationName			   
,IMSManufacturerName		   
,IMSTherapeuticClass4Name	   
,IMSStrengthName			   
,IMSNewformcodeiName		   
,IMSNewformcodeiiName		   
,IMSStandardCorporationName	   
,IMSStandardManufacturerName   
,IMSStandardBrandName		   
,IMSStandardizedRateByDot	   
,IMSCoreMarket				   
from itg.itg_ims_map_market
union all
SELECT 
IMSMarketName                  
,IMSMoleculeCompositionName	   
,IMSProductName				   
,IMSCorporationName			   
,IMSManufacturerName		   
,IMSTherapeuticClass4Name	   
,IMSStrengthName			   
,IMSNewformcodeiName		   
,IMSNewformcodeiiName		   
,IMSStandardCorporationName	   
,IMSStandardManufacturerName   
,IMSStandardBrandName		   
,IMSStandardizedRateByDot	   
,IMSCoreMarket				   
from stg.stg_ims_map_market
) AA
ORDER BY  IMSStandardBrandName DESC
,IMSMarketName                
,IMSMoleculeCompositionName	 
,IMSProductName				 
,IMSCorporationName			 
,IMSManufacturerName		 
,IMSTherapeuticClass4Name	 
,IMSStrengthName			 
,IMSNewformcodeiName		 
,IMSNewformcodeiiName

select 
distinct 
Market	            Market
,moleculecomposition	moleculecomposition
,TereputiceClassIV	TereputiceClassIV
,newformcodei	    newformcodei
,newformcodeii	    newformcodeii
,strength	        strength
,[Index]             standardized_rate_by_DOT
,core_market         core_market
from stg.check_ims_map_market;

SELECT   count(1) as cnt
FROM [stg].[data_check]
WHERE CheckCode in ('1','2','3')
  AND CheckFlag='1'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select name AS TableName from sys.objects where schema_name(schema_id) = 'dm_cdi' 
and (name not like '%_bak%'
and name not like '%_bk%'
and name not like '%test%') 
and type = 'U' order by name

@concat('select name AS TableName from sys.objects where schema_name(schema_id) = ''',pipeline().parameters.pDatamartName,''' and (name not like ''%_bak%'' and name not like ''%_bk%''and name not like ''%test%'') and type = ''U'' order by name')

@concat('select name AS TableName from sys.objects where schema_name(schema_id) = ''',pipeline().parameters.pDatamartName,''' and (name not like ''%_bak%'' and name not like ''%_bk%''and name not like ''%test%'') and type = ''U'' order by name')

properties.description: Linked Service to Test Environment Data Lake Storage Gen 2 for ChinaDataLake Project
Linked Service to China Synapse Test Environment for ChinaDataLake project
